channel.title: Does anyone have a full npc spawn list?
channel.description:
Just want to test some stuff, using the command npc_create npc_(x)
Figured some out myself, but I really want to know them all. Anyone have a list of the npc command names?

item.title: Does anyone have a full npc spawn list?

item.description:
Crypt19:

Not sure if there’s a list anywhere, but if you wanna boot up Hammer and configure it for BM, you could probably just take a look at the entity list.

Or you could see this post.
